meanings.sent1: I watched the flower upcurl towards the sun.

meanings.definition: A curl or twist that goes upwards.
meanings.sent1: The upcurl of the vine reached for the sky.
meanings.sent2: She admired the elegant upcurl of the staircase railing.
meanings.sent3: The upcurl of the ice cream cone made it look fancy.
meanings.sent4: The upcurl of the wave was a beautiful sight at the beach.
meanings.sent5: The upcurl of the tree branches created a natural canopy above.
